description: NTS Map: 082J11Elevation Gain: 296 m (971 ft).This is relatively easy hike to an active Fire Look that provides fantastic views of the Kananasksis valley and lakes.
directions: Paved pull off on the west side of Highway 40 about 8km south of the gate into Peter Lougheed Prov Park. Go around gate at pull off, over Pocaterra creek and head south following old fire road. Head south on trail known as Whiskey Jack. It's a fire road and the lookout person does drive it on occasion
title: Kananaskis Fire Lookout
